Name: Angel Flare
About the game: The world of Angel Flare is set in a fictitious future where new countries have emerged and old ones have disappeared. The game is told by the memories of one of the pilots, Rob, thus the vintage colour scheme. He is remembering the days that lead him and his friends to be professional pilots. Do you remember the day you made that crucial decision that changed your life? That’s Angel Flare's story. Angel Flare is a new sport. Imagine the combination of Formula One/Nascar with Laser Tag/Paint Ball in the sky. So the weapons and ammunition are not military class type, they are ineffective and used only for show. 15+ Different Fighter Jets, with each one having its own specific attributes 10+ Types of weapons (Missiles, Lasers, Incendiary Missiles, Prism Lasers and more) 30+ Unique upgrades for the plane (Afterburners, Anti-Gravity Engine, Stealth Body…) 6 Pilots with unique Skills and unique superpower (Hacking, Time Slow, Call reinforcements…) 2 Types of Wingman drones to accompany you in the air skirmishes Challenges Maps, With unique set of rules and conditions A robust system of collectible blueprints that allow you to unlock new planes Stunning Visuals with a unique art style Varying weather Effects Many locations including Mountains, Sea, Great Plains and Deserts Full controller support
